content: WSC 7.25-S Circular saw Circular saw for heavy-duty straight cuts up to 2-3/8 depth with a 7.25 blade ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy-to-use circular saw with high system performance and feed rate Fast rip cuts at depths of up to 2.38 Sets the benchmark in robustness (reliable, robust pivoting guard) Powerful 15A motor for reliable jobsite performance Applications Cutting concrete forming boards Cutting wood beams Cutting gypsum boards Cutting sandwich panels ### TECHNICAL DATA: Max. cutting depth: 2.64 in Blade diameter - range: 7-1/4 - 7-15/32 in Cutting depth at 45 degrees: 1-13/16 in Technical Data | Max. cutting depth | 2.64 in | Cutting depth at 45 degrees | 1-13/16 in | No load RPM | gear 1: 5800 rpm | Base material | Wood, Sandwich panel | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 11.7 lb | Guiding rail compatibility | Yes | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 89 dB (A) | 1 | Triaxial vibration value for sawing into wood (ah,W) | 2.5 m/sÂ² | 2 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 427728 - Circular saw 7.25-S w/box - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x WSC 7.25-S 120V USA Circular saw
